forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
